name: Inifinity Fall
description:
Get scores by falling. If you BOUNCE in the platforms, you lose your score.
But don't worry, your high score is still saved in the screen!

Movement:
- "a" and "d" to move (or left arrow/right;arrow).
Audio:
- "q" and "e" to decrease/increase the sound volume.
- "m" to mute/unmute the sound.
